DOC.brief_summary: Observational study of influence of gemcitabine treatment on serological and immunological status and gene expression profile in patients with pancreatic tubular carcinoma after tumor resection.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Gemcitabine Treatment on Immunological and Serological Profile in Patients With Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: ECOG performance status 02 at the time of inclusion Following R0 or R1 pancreatic tubular adenocarcinoma resection Pregnancy Serious comorbidity
